text: @SteveScalise Hypocrite. We wouldn't be neck deep in this mess hadn't the leader of your party dismissed coronavirus as a democrat hoax while insiders were busy dumping their stocks. Both parties, get this done! And YOU do your stinking job don't preach to anyone about playing politics! 😡
